testsuite.name: Scenario: Test that when the show launch page policy is set to true, the launch page is displayed

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that when the show launch page policy is set to true, the launch page is displayed

testcase.name: And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that when the show launch page policy is set to true, the launch page is displayed

testcase.name: And I choose creating new lesson in "Student Readiness" unit from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that when the show launch page policy is set to true, the launch page is displayed

testcase.name: And Lesson Editor is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that when the show launch page policy is set to true, the launch page is displayed

testcase.name: When enter Lesson name "Lesson with Launch Page"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that when the show launch page policy is set to true, the launch page is displayed

testcase.name: And I click the new question button on the lesson design page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that when the show launch page policy is set to true, the launch page is displayed

testcase.name: And I create question "Formula Question" with label "Formula Question Label"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that when the show launch page policy is set to true, the launch page is displayed

testcase.name: And I create a Mathematical Formula response area in the lesson question editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that when the show launch page policy is set to true, the launch page is displayed

testcase.name: And I save & close the new question in the assignment editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that when the show launch page policy is set to true, the launch page is displayed

testcase.name: When I click on the Properties tab
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that when the show launch page policy is set to true, the launch page is displayed

testcase.name: Then I see that the show launch page checkbox is set to false
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that when the show launch page policy is set to true, the launch page is displayed

testcase.name: When I set the show launch page checkbox to true
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that when the show launch page policy is set to true, the launch page is displayed

testcase.name: And I save & close the lesson on the properties page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that when the show launch page policy is set to true, the launch page is displayed

testcase.name: And I save and close the lesson summary details
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that when the show launch page policy is set to true, the launch page is displayed

testcase.name: Then the new lesson "Lesson with Launch Page" is visible in its own expanded column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that when the show launch page policy is set to true, the launch page is displayed

testcase.name: When I navigate to the System Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that when the show launch page policy is set to true, the launch page is displayed

testcase.name: And I am on "Class Homepage" page of "Demonstration Class" class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that when the show launch page policy is set to true, the launch page is displayed

testcase.name: Then I launch the "Lesson with Launch Page" lesson in "Student Readiness" unit
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that when the show launch page policy is set to true, the launch page is displayed

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that when the show launch page policy is set to true, the launch page is displayed

testsuite.system-out: Scenario: Verify the Show Launch Page policy checkbox is disabled when the lesson has advanced policies ?[90m# ManageLesson.feature:91?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI click on the Properties tab?[0m ?[90m# LessonEditorSteps.clickPropertiesTab()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI see that the show launch page checkbox is set to ?[0m?[32m?[1mfalse?[0m ?[90m# AssignmentEditorPropertiesSteps.assertShowLaunchPageState(boolean)?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI click the Advanced Policies button?[0m ?[90m# AssignmentEditorPropertiesSteps.clickAdvancedPoliciesButton()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI am on the Advanced Policies Editor page?[0m ?[90m# AdvancedPoliciesEditorSteps.assertOnAdvancedPoliciesPage()?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI click the Design button?[0m ?[90m# AdvancedPoliciesEditorSteps.clickDesignButton()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI see the Remove Criterion button?[0m ?[90m# AdvancedPoliciesEditorSteps.assertRemoveCriterionButtonIsVisible()?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI click the Back button?[0m ?[90m# AdvancedPoliciesEditorSteps.clickBackButton()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI am on the Policy Editor?[0m ?[90m# AssignmentEditorPropertiesSteps.assertOnPolicyEditor()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI see that the show launch page checkbox is set to ?[0m?[32m?[1mtrue?[0m ?[90m# AssignmentEditorPropertiesSteps.assertShowLaunchPageState(boolean)?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI see that the show launch page checkbox is disabled?[0m ?[90m# AssignmentEditorPropertiesSteps.assertShowLaunchPageDisabled()?[0m
